mapper.select: SELECT PC.POST_ID, PC.COMMENT_CONTENT, PC.CREATE_DATE, P.POST_TITLE, P.POST_CONTENT, B.COVER, B.TITLE, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBDATE FROM TBL_POST_COMMENT PC JOIN TBL_POST P ON PC.POST_ID = P.POST_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B ON P.ISBN13 = B.ISBN13 WHERE P.POST_ID = #{postId}

SELECT PC.COMMENT_ID, PC.COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(PC.CREATE_DATE, ('YYYY-MM-DD')) AS CREATE_DATE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.NICKNAME, P.PROFILE_UUID, P.PROFILE_UPLOAD, P.PROFILE_NAME FROM TBL_POST_COMMENT PC JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON PC.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN TBL_PROFILE P ON M.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID WHERE POST_ID = #{postId} order by COMMENT_ID DESC;
